title: LOW FPS
body:
I play league with Intel CORE i5 and Inetl(R) HD Graphics 4600.
Before the surmmoner's rift change to snow version, I play league with high quility with sound, skype and I had 50~60 fps.
Now with the change I have 15~38 fps with middle quility without sound. Sometimes the game stop and it just become gray moniter.
I re-instoled league of legend and same things happen. Please tell me why this is happening and how can i deal with it.

replies.body: When you say change, which do you mean exactly?  Generally, fps issues can happen from outdated drivers, bad game files, or even hardware.  Reinstalling was a good step, and I recommend using the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to run through some additional steps to rule out possibilities.  The guide should help tune things up!
